content: SP-H Speed core bit Premium core bit for faster, smoother coring in virtually all types of concrete – for ≥2.5 kW tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Our highest coring speed – up to 50% faster than previous premium core bits, helping you get the job done earlier Smoother coring – up to 40% less pressure needed on the handle versus previous premium core bits, saving your energy when core drilling all day Versatility – drill in practically every concrete type, including concrete with a high rebar content, using the same core bits Hilti Equidist technology (1-3/8 diameter and above) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Supplied without connection end Applications Rig-based wet coring in virtually all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Core bit diameters are nominal, for actual diameter please contact Hilti Customer Service For use with: DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA Base materials: Concrete Technical Data | For use with | DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Change module | Yes (Optional) | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BL (Hilti), BS (1-1/4 in) | Product Class | Premium | Segment height | 13/32 in ### ITEMS- 3770235 -
